description: Source file for the main UI components of a Note-taking app, built with Jetpack Compose. Contains composable functions for app screens including main, editing, and listing notes, as well as navigation setup.

methods.name: NotesApp
methods.description: Sets up navigation Graph and routes for main and edit screens.

methods.name: MainScreen
methods.description: Displays list of notes with search, add, edit, and delete functionalities.

methods.name: NoteListItem
methods.description: UI component for a single note item in the list, with options to edit or delete.

methods.name: EditNoteScreen
methods.description: UI for creating and editing notes, with validation and save/cancel controls.
